title: FBI raids former National Security Adviser John Bolton's home
description: Trump stripped Bolton's security protections in January.
content:
The FBI raided the home of John Bolton , President Trump 's former national security adviser, on Friday morning, multiple  outlets  reported .

Why it matters: Bolton was vocal in his criticism of the president after working in the first Trump administration. Trump has aggressively used the power of the presidency to punish political foes.

The FBI and White House did not immediately respond to Axios' request for comment.

Driving the news: The raid is part of a high-profile national security probe involving classified documents, according to the New York Post, which first reported the news.

What we're watching: "NO ONE is above the law," FBI Director Kash Patel wrote on X Friday morning, without reference to a specific situation. "FBI agents on mission."

Zoom out: In January, Trump stripped Bolton's security protections along with those of other political adversaries.

In a foreword to his memoir that published last year Bolton wrote that "a mountain of facts demonstrates that Trump is unfit to be President."

Publication of Bolton's memoir was delayed in 2020 as the White House reviewed its content.

Context: Bolton has faced death threats from Iran after being a fierce critic of the regime.

In 2022, an Iranian national was charged in connection with a plot to assassinate Bolton.

Go deeper: First look: John Bolton's predictions for a second Trump term

keywords.name: former National Security Adviser John Boltons home
President Trump s former national security adviser

summary: The FBI has reportedly raided the home of John Bolton, President Trump's former national security adviser, as part of a high-profile national security probe involving classified documents. Bolton was vocal in his criticism of the president and has faced death threats from Iran after criticising him. The FBI and White House did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
shortSummary: The FBI raided the home of former US National Security Adviser John Bolton, amid a high-profile national security investigation.
argos_summary: The FBI raided the home of John Bolton, former national security adviser to President Trump, as part of a national security investigation involving classified documents. Bolton, a vocal critic of Trump, had his security protections stripped by the former president in January. The raid highlights ongoing tensions and the use of presidential power against political opponents, with Bolton previously stating that Trump is unfit for office.
